name: Simulator Fireworks Bang Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Fireworks Bang.
Simulator Fireworks Bang Joke
Simulator Fireworks Explosion joke - a joke simulation game where you have to decorate the Christmas and New Year!
Love Holiday Christmas and New Year? Like let the fireworks and firecrackers to blow up? I want to raise all spirits?
Then our app for you! With our safe fireworks, firecrackers and crackers do not you who do no harm!
Scare friends, blow in the game petard not expect them!
When the clock in the new year to score 12 hours, including fireworks and you will see all surprise and delight!
Attention! This is only a simulator firecrackers and they will not harm your health!
Make fun and play your family and friends!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave feedback for the games! We will try to make them even more interesting!
